question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
• give contact details for when you are away
• give instructions about how to care for your pet
• describe other household duties
text: I hope you are doing well and fine there. I like to appreciate your kindness in agreeing to look after my house while I am on a trip to Shimla.

For a start, As I told you earlier during our previous talk that I wish to join a camping and trekking trip due to which I needed you to be present at my home to take care of it as my family is not present here.
I also want to let you that I will be on holiday for five days i.e from coming Monday to Friday.

Because of the absence of my parents, there is no one who will take care of my pet 'Moti'. He needs his food and meals from time to time.So, I want you to please feed him after every two hours. His food is placed at the counter near his shelter.
Moreover, He is a vegetarian and eats only special vegetables which I'll put in the refrigerator.

In addition to it, there is an important parcel containing a letter which will arrive during that time. Therefore, I request you to please collect it and send that document to me on my email after scanning it.
I'll hand over the keys to my neighbour who is living in front of my house. I'll come back on Friday night and meet you at my home.
I feel very thankful for your kind help.
